author: Michael Desousa
text: 'I can honestly tell you that the chicken wings here are no joke. Make sure you get the chicken wings'

text: 'One of the best pizzeria to have a cheese slice!'

author: Mr. Joanna Dark
text: "I ordered 4 boxes of  Pizza for my daughter's birthday the night before
column5: hoping this would eliminate the problem of my food getting on time. My Pizza arrived an hour later than expected. They didn't even call me as a courtesy to inform me that my delivery would be late. When I called
column6: I was told it should be there as we spoke and the driver still didn't arrive. When I finally got the Pizza
column7: the pies looked burnt/recooked. I will not recommend this place for delivery and terrible customer service. I should have ordered from another place. Avoid ordering from them; you might as well starve
column8: and it seems you pay for old Pizza. I wish they had negative stars as rating."

author: Eric J
text: 'Amazing pizza and even better service. The owner clearly takes care of his customers and truly cares about their experience.'

text: 'Says they are open until 3AM online but got there 250a

author: The Critical J
text: "PROS: This pizza place is the best parlor overall in the area. Unlike the other pizza parlors this place is big
column5: clean
column6:
and has room to sit down. They accept credit cards for any size purchase and the employees are nice. It's located where many of the bars are and they offer a variety of toppings just like any parlor would

CONS: The tables can only hold 3 people max. so if you have a group of 5+ then you're out of luck on grabbing a place to sit

OVERALL: I will be coming back here. This place is the best around
column7: so why would I settle for less?"

column5: sauce
column6: and meat. Seasonings on the dishes left a lot to be desired and we found metal shavings in some of our pasta dishes! Cannolis are also very subpar despite the premium price. If your going for Italian food in hoboken

text: "Was passing through and needed a slice. The nearby competition wouldn't take cards for under $10.  I asked on the street for a decent  place and was pointed in this direction ...under $10 on the card? no problem. So I tried the margherita pizza and was pretty amazed. Nice thinner crust
column5: great sauce and taste and it's definitely up there in the above average
column6: higher quality

author: E M
text: 'We had heard Impostos was under new management so we decided to give it a try. Safe to say we were pleasantly surprised! text: 'I am incredibly happy that I recently revisited Imposto‚Äôs! I had heard that there was new ownership

author: Ariel Self
text: "The new owners of Imposto's go above and beyond to give top notch service. They're friendly and personable.. not to mention their food is DELICIOUS. I was addicted for an entire week

column6: who were also very sweet people. I love a family business :)  I can't recommend Imposto's enough
column7: any time a friend or client is new to visiting Hoboken
column8: I take them to Imposto's for the best WORLD FAMOUS pizza. I would tell you which one is my favorite.. but it's so hard to choose!  Highly recommend!"

author: Carly Porreca
text: 'Do not ever go to this place. I came here to get a slice of pizza and accidentally left my phone on the counter while ordering (typical mistake). I noticed didn‚Äôt have it as soon as i sat down to eat and asked the staff if they found a phone and they said no the multiple times we asked.  My friend had my location tracked and it said that I.T was in the pizza place for the whole two hours we were here. We checked the entire place up and down and had every customer in there searching with us. We accused the workers multiple times of taking  I.T and they kept denying saying they were not ‚Äúthose type of people.‚Äù As soon as i threatened to call the cops
column5: they said that they were going to check the bathroom. They came back from the bathRoom with the phone soaking wet in toilet water claiming that i had dropped I.T in the toilet. However
column6: i did not go to the bathroom once the whole time i was there. Not to mention
column7: i had multiple people calling and tRacking my phone within these two hours and I.T was ringing and trackable so If I.T had been in there the whole time I.T would not have been responsive. These workers planted my phone inside of the toilet so that the police wouldn‚Äôt come and search them. They are thieves and criminals. Do not give this place any business.'

I wasted my money and my chocolate cake was nasty tasted like it was from a old vending machine...never again I would rather starve'

author: Carsten Hansen
text: 'In my humble opinion
column5: this is the best pizza place in Hoboken and there are several. It has been around as far back as I have come to Hoboken
column6: the food is great
column7: not just the pizzas. Their sandwiches are large
column9: the food is cooked fresh and is very tasty. The interior is unassuming but more than sufficient if you come for a quick bite to eat.'

author: GorJust Genius
text: 'Unsanitary
column5: and definitely gross. This place should be closed down.'

author: Roddy Munro
text: "I'm sat in this facility right now and it's bloody disgusting
column5: everything is definitely microwaved. Lasagne tastes like plastic. I'd have a better meal in a homeless soup kitchen."

author: Juan Vallejo
text:
'(Translated by Google) Excellent service good pizza

(Original)
Excelente servicio buena pizza'

author: GREEK BOI
text: "Your a sad excuse for a pizza place. Your online orders in said you deliver to my address and I called to ask for napkins and told me they weren't going to deliver and didn't bother to cancel my order on grub hub and tried keeping my money. The guy said we close soon anyways so didn't Wana take my order\nYou don't treat customs like that. Hope your business fails more"

author: Priydarshan Panchal
text: "It's a good place that is open late in the night. Popular among people who attends last call ..."

author: Susan Cunningham
text: 'Stopped in to get a slice. Cheap food. Lacked flavor.'

author: Roselle Roman
text: "The pizza is big it's like eating 2 slices of pizza in one."

author: Julia Solomon
text: 'Really good pizza. Pepperoni slices were nice and thin how I like them. Recommended!'

author: N vic
text: 'This place reminds me a lot of a public school cafeteria: terrible food
column5: dirty tables
column6: and extremely rude employees. If you see yourself wandering towards this place
column7: turn your wayward keister around and go somewhere else. The cheese and sauce-covered cardboard sliver they call pizza upset my stomach

author: Steve B.
text: 'Excellent food every time! My husband and I always order from here.'

author: Ming Lai
text: 'Good lunch specials options.'

author: Hovie Forman
text: 'Great lunch and dinner Specials'

author: Wero Montiel
text: 'great subs and calzone! great price too'

author: G Miland
text: 'Great Buffalo chicken Pizza. Lots of choices. Good food'

author: Gus Charles
text: 'Good pizza
column5: deep crust
column6: premises very clean but plastic decor knocks it back a bit.'

author: Donnamarie Reese
text: 'Enjoyed the outdoors eating stuff artichokes and pizza was the best'

author: John Ozed
text: "Decent place perhaps the best meatball sandwich in town?\nIt's where the smart set meet and eat."

author: Marc Gonzalez
text: 'Very good pizza
column5: large choice of pizza
column6: sandwiches
column7: etc. Would definitely come back to this place'

author: Yifan(Eric) Wang
text: 'Decent food at cheap prices'

author: Melissa Hebert
text: "How do they manage to make a fresh-baked pizza taste stale? I've had BOGO bread from a bakery outlet that's tasted fresher than this crust."

author: Kay Kay
text: "First and last time ordering they over charge for the food. Bake ziti was extremely dry basically just noodles and cheese. Chicken was overcooked and dry bc of it being overcooked. The Pizza was flat and slid in the box. The rolls were just thrown in the bag on top of the food not in a boso or anything just thrown in the bag wit the ziti and chicken. Never again will I order a meal from them. The total was 37.87 and the guy answering the phone is rude. Now after waiting 45 min on them to deliver I'm  waiting on them to one get this dry a as food."

author: milan barot
text: 'They dont even receive phone calls'

author: Mike P
text: 'I dont understand the pricing here'

author: T. Pisani
text: 'Excellent food and great lunch special prices'

author: Michael Leto
text: 'Amazing pizza. Reasonable prices.'

author: krishna rana
text: 'pathetic service and bad pizza'

author: JD Rivera
text: 'Good lunch specials'

author: Joe Wayant
text: 'Oh how I miss this place
column5: being a sub/sandwich connoisseur this is by far my favorite place to get a sub hard bread thin sliced veggies and pile high meats with a dressing
column6: you go imposto all the way from Arizona'

author: Matthew McCaslin
text: 'Customer service was poor on a good day. Lasagna meat was rubbery.'

author: N1234
text: "Imposto.. As the name says it's an imposter of good quality pizza. Dough quality is so Meh!! Cheese is so Meh. Dried out broccoli stump in my veg pizza.. Uggh won't go there again."

author: StevePittman Louisville
text: 'Very good food. Very prompt delivery. First recommendation from Doubletree hotel for all guests who need an after hours bite.'

author: SAMIR AVANESSOV
text: 'Way better then pizza in NYC'

author: Nasir mahmood
text: "I don't know why this he's had such low rating. I'm a native New Yorker use too good pizza and this is as good as any"

author: Chirag Khushalani
text: 'Amazing breakfast pizza!'

author: Yuly C.Rey
text: 'I had pizza to go a couple of times. Today i decided to sit n look around.\nService is very good\nPizza? Oh so rico! Fresh
column5: hot and crispy on the bottom.\nThe place is good all looks tide n clean.\nI will definitely keep coming back.'

author: Joe Gallagher
text: 'Good fresh pizza.  Not salty or greasy.  Many different choices.  Good prices'

author: Melissa White
text: 'Excellent quality and tons of food at a low price. Would definitely come back!'

author: Anime Fan
text: "Food taste great. But staff is rude and doesn't understand their own menu. Its a shame but the food is really good but the way they pack it for delivering is really messy and staff is not helpful at all."

author: Purvin Patel
text: 'I really like their crust. Different and a good change of pace.'

author: Andrew Stranovsky
text: 'Conveniently located  on First and Washington.  Cheap two slices and a soda.'

text: 'rip off pizza never gonna go back again capich'

author: Luiz Neto
text: 'Horrible service at the register'

author: Ben Jamin
text: "I got 3 calls at 1:25 am Monday morning that woke up my sleeping baby.  Never ever ordered from there
column5: don't live there
column6: and to top if off they hung up when I answered and called back again 2 more times.   FkU"

author: Rajen Patel
text: 'Very bad service and rude staff!!'

author: Arpit
text:
'Horrible. AVOID AT ALL COSTS. This is a racist place. Even after paying cash and not being offered a receipt the staff insisted that I and my group step out of the store in excruciating cold weather. Upon investigation we were yelled at for not asking for a receipt. According to better business burro the receipt should offered. We were made to pay twice to get a whole pie.

Do not go here. Go right across CVS they have better quicker and less discriminated service.

Thanks.'

author: Selena Zuniga
text: 'Good food people who say it bad they are jerks.there nice they care i recommend it 5 stars go and buy there good there no rat the worker are good  very good'

author: Marcel Junger
text: 'Impostos serves the very best eggplant rollentini in hoboken!\nI even started a corp. acct with them
column5: been with these guys for years now and have never ran into any disappointments.\nprices are good and portions are huge.\nThey have a good selection to choose from and everything is always fresh and piping hot-Mmmmmm!'
